title: Projects
subtitle: My Recent Work
description: Showcasing my technical skills in machine learning, data analysis, and software development

projects.title: Hand Sign Detection
projects.description: Built a real-time hand gesture recognition system to identify ASL signs using a webcam.
projects.detailedDescription: Used OpenCV and TensorFlow to detect and classify American Sign Language hand gestures in real-time. Deployed as a web app using Streamlit, Docker, and GitHub CI/CD. Hosted on a custom Streamlit Cloud domain for easy access and interaction.

projects.title: ResQMe – AI-Powered Emergency Response Platform
projects.description: Developed an intelligent platform that streamlines emergency response coordination and resource dispatching.
projects.detailedDescription: ResQMe is a real-time AI-powered emergency response system designed to detect distress situations, notify local authorities, and intelligently allocate nearby resources. The platform includes victim-side alerts, responder dashboards, and an admin panel, all powered by location-aware logic and cloud-based infrastructure. Built during RiverHacks 2025 and awarded for excellence in community impact and innovation.

projects.title: Interactive Data Dashboard
projects.description: Built a dynamic dashboard for visualizing and analyzing census data with Streamlit.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed an interactive web application using Streamlit to explore and analyze census data through customizable charts, tables, and filters. Implemented real-time data manipulation with Pandas and integrated Plotly visualizations for clear insights. Deployed seamlessly on Streamlit Cloud for public access and linked with GitHub for continuous updates.

projects.title: Experano – Localized AI Recommendation System
projects.description: Implemented an AI-powered recommendation system using LLaMA to generate context-aware suggestions based on user location and preferences.
projects.detailedDescription: Contributed to a web-based project that delivers smart, localized recommendations using a fine-tuned LLaMA model. Focused on integrating AI inference to personalize user experiences, enhance relevance, and dynamically adapt to user input. Ensured smooth model integration and optimized performance for real-time use.

projects.title: Sea Level Predictor
projects.description: Created a linear regression model to predict future sea level rise based on historical data.
projects.detailedDescription: Applied linear regression on historical sea level data from 1880-2013 to forecast future trends.

projects.title: Student Performance Prediction
projects.description: Built a machine learning model to predict student academic performance based on various factors.
projects.detailedDescription: Developed multiple classification models (Random Forest, SVM, and Gradient Boosting) to predict performance levels.
